T02D3178:195a-1: w'i g'i shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3178:195a-3: ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs //
T02D3178:195a-4: de kho na bzhin du stong pa nyid du la
T02D3178:195a-5: sogs pa bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs padma'i steng
T02D3178:195a-6: du zla ba la yi ge aa dkar po las
T02D3178:195a-7: byung pa'i dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi ngag gi dbang
T02D3178:195a-8: phyug ste / sku thams cad dkar ba zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3178:195a-10: sangs rgyas lnga dang rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3178:195a-11: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza' mnga' ba /
T02D3178:195a-12: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3178:195a-13: phyag gnyis chos bshad kyi phyag rgyas mtshon pa ral
T02D3178:195a-14: gri dang mda' dang rdo rje ni g-yas pa'i phyag
T02D3178:195a-15: gsum na'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang /
T02D3178:195a-16: gzhu dang rdo rje dril bu ni g-yon pa'i phyag gsum na ste /
T02D3178:195a-17: rdo rje skyil mo krung du bdag nyid rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3178:195a-18: snying gar zla ba la h'um mthing nag las byung
T02D3178:195a-19: ba'i sa bon dang bcas pa'i rdo rje ni phyag
T02D3178:195a-20: rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3178:195a-21: smin mtshams su yi ge tam ser po las sa
T02D3178:195a-22: bon dang bcas pa'i rin po che ste chos kyi
T02D3178:195a-24: mgrin par yi ge hr'i: dmar po las byung ba'i
T02D3178:195a-25: sa bon dang bcas pa'i padma ni dam tshig gi
T02D3178:195a-27: spyi bor yi ge a'a: ljang gu las byung pa'i
T02D3178:195a-28: sa bon dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje ni
T02D3178:195a-29: las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3178:195a-30: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa 'dir bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3178:195a-31: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'a na dzny'a na m'a
T02D3178:195a-32: rtti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa sarba
T02D3178:195a-33: dha rm'a ga ga n'a ma la su ba ri
T02D3178:195a-34: shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na grgha aa: bya
T02D3178:195a-35: ba'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3178:195a-36: de nas rdo rje bcings la gung mo gnyis kyi
T02D3178:195a-37: tshigs gsum pa bcag pas ral gri'i rnam par lta
T02D3178:195a-38: bur gzung par bya zhing mdzub mo gnyis bslang ste
T02D3178:195a-39: / mthe bong gnyis kyis stong pa bkag la gzung
T02D3178:195a-40: bar bya ba 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
T02D3178:195a-41: / // de nas rang gi lce la zla ba
T02D3178:195a-42: la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: dmar po sa bon
T02D3178:195a-43: gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgoms la khro bo'i tshig
T02D3178:195a-44: gis sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3178:195a-45: de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3178:195b-0: aom badzr'a @195b ti kshna du: khatstshed pra dzny'a na mu rta ye /
T02D3178:195b-1: dzny'a na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra aa ra
T02D3178:195b-2: pa tsa na ma: grangs brgya rtsa brgyad du mtshan
T02D3178:195b-3: brjod pas kyang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa dus
T02D3178:195b-4: ji lta par bklag par bya ba yin no //
T02D3178:195b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi dag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub
